## PopulatableBeraBorrow.unstakePOLLEN() method

Withdraw POLLEN from staking.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unstakePOLLEN(amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedBeraBorrowTransaction<P, SentBeraBorrowTransaction<S, BeraBorrowReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of POLLEN to withdraw. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedBeraBorrowTransaction](./lib-base.populatedberaborrowtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentBeraBorrowTransaction](./lib-base.sentberaborrowtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [BeraBorrowReceipt](./lib-base.beraborrowreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the POLLEN stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base.pollenstake.collateralgain.md) and [NECT gain](./lib-base.pollenstake.nectgain.md)<!-- -->.
